pokemons.name: Turtwig
pokemons.description: A Grass-type Pokémon that resembles a small turtle.

pokemons.name: Grotle
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Turtwig, a Grass-type Pokémon with a tree on its back.

pokemons.name: Torterra
pokemons.description: The final evolution of Turtwig, a Grass/Ground-type Pokémon with a vast landscape on its back.

pokemons.name: Chimchar
pokemons.description: A Fire-type Pokémon known for the flame on its tail.

pokemons.name: Monferno
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Chimchar, a Fire/Fighting-type Pokémon with fiery punches.

pokemons.name: Infernape
pokemons.description: The final evolution of Chimchar, a Fire/Fighting-type Pokémon skilled in martial arts.

pokemons.name: Piplup
pokemons.description: A Water-type Pokémon that resembles a penguin with a blue crown.

pokemons.name: Prinplup
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Piplup, a Water-type Pokémon with a more regal appearance.

pokemons.name: Empoleon
pokemons.description: The final evolution of Piplup, a Water/Steel-type Pokémon with a trident-like beak.

pokemons.name: Starly
pokemons.description: A Normal/Flying-type Pokémon known for its sharp beak and keen eyesight.

pokemons.name: Staravia
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Starly, a Normal/Flying-type Pokémon with a more impressive wingspan.

pokemons.name: Staraptor
pokemons.description: The final evolution of Starly, a powerful Normal/Flying-type Pokémon with a fierce appearance.

pokemons.name: Bidoof
pokemons.description: A simple Normal-type Pokémon known for its large front teeth.

pokemons.name: Bibarel
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Bidoof, a Normal/Water-type Pokémon with strong gnawing abilities.

pokemons.name: Kricketot
pokemons.description: A Bug-type Pokémon known for its chirping sound that changes in pitch.

pokemons.name: Kricketune
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Kricketot, a Bug-type Pokémon that creates melodies with its long antennae.

pokemons.name: Shinx
pokemons.description: An Electric-type Pokémon with a keen sense of hearing and a powerful roar.

pokemons.name: Luxio
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Shinx, an Electric-type Pokémon with increased electrical power.

pokemons.name: Luxray
pokemons.description: The final evolution of Shinx, a powerful Electric-type Pokémon with a majestic appearance.

pokemons.name: Budew
pokemons.description: A Grass/Poison-type Pokémon that blooms into a beautiful flower when it evolves.

pokemons.name: Roserade
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Budew, a Grass/Poison-type Pokémon that releases a pleasant fragrance.

pokemons.name: Cranidos
pokemons.description: A Rock-type Pokémon with a hard skull, known for its powerful headbutts.

pokemons.name: Rampardos
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Cranidos, a Rock-type Pokémon with an even harder skull.

pokemons.name: Shieldon
pokemons.description: A Rock/Steel-type Pokémon with a protective face, often found in ancient fossils.

pokemons.name: Bastiodon
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Shieldon, a Rock/Steel-type Pokémon with a sturdy shield-like face.

pokemons.name: Burmy
pokemons.description: A Bug-type Pokémon that takes on different appearances based on its surroundings.

pokemons.name: Wormadam
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Burmy, a Bug/Grass-type Pokémon with a cloak made of leaves.

pokemons.name: Mothim
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Burmy, a Bug/Flying-type Pokémon that is attracted to light.

pokemons.name: Combee
pokemons.description: A Bug/Flying-type Pokémon that forms colonies with a single female as the leader.

pokemons.name: Vespiquen
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Combee, a Bug/Flying-type Pokémon known for its protective nature.

pokemons.name: Pachirisu
pokemons.description: An Electric-type Pokémon with a fluffy tail that generates electrical energy.

pokemons.name: Buizel
pokemons.description: A Water-type Pokémon that is known for its swift swimming and flotation sacs.

pokemons.name: Floatzel
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Buizel, a Water-type Pokémon that moves gracefully in the water.

pokemons.name: Cherubi
pokemons.description: A Grass-type Pokémon with a small cherry on its head, which grows into a larger cherry.

pokemons.name: Cherrim
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Cherubi, a Grass-type Pokémon that changes appearance based on sunlight.

pokemons.name: Shellos
pokemons.description: A Water-type Pokémon that has different forms based on its habitat.

pokemons.name: Gastrodon
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Shellos, a Water/Ground-type Pokémon with a unique sea slug appearance.

pokemons.name: Ambipom
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Aipom, a Normal-type Pokémon with two tails and hand-like extensions.

pokemons.name: Drifloon
pokemons.description: A Ghost/Flying-type Pokémon that appears to be a drifting balloon with a string.

pokemons.name: Drifblim
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Drifloon, a Ghost/Flying-type Pokémon with a larger balloon body.

pokemons.name: Buneary
pokemons.description: A Normal-type Pokémon known for its long ears and cute appearance.

pokemons.name: Lopunny
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Buneary, a Normal-type Pokémon with increased speed and elegance.

pokemons.name: Mismagius
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Misdreavous, a Ghost-type Pokémon known for its magical abilities.

pokemons.name: Honchkrow
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Murkrow, a Dark/Flying-type Pokémon with a sinister appearance.

pokemons.name: Glameow
pokemons.description: A Normal-type Pokémon with a sleek and feline appearance.

pokemons.name: Purugly
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Glameow, a Normal-type Pokémon with a more robust and fierce demeanor.

pokemons.name: Chingling
pokemons.description: A Psychic-type Pokémon that is known for its gentle and soothing chime.

pokemons.name: Stunky
pokemons.description: A Poison/Dark-type Pokémon with a foul odor that acts as a defense mechanism.

pokemons.name: Skuntank
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Stunky, a Poison/Dark-type Pokémon that sprays a noxious fluid as a defensive move.

pokemons.name: Bronzor
pokemons.description: A Steel/Psychic-type Pokémon with a metallic body that reflects psychic waves.

pokemons.name: Bronzong
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Bronzor, a Steel/Psychic-type Pokémon that controls bells with its psychic powers.

pokemons.name: Bonsly
pokemons.description: A Rock-type Pokémon that resembles a small bonsai tree.

pokemons.name: Mime Jr.
pokemons.description: A Psychic/Fairy-type Pokémon that mimics the movements of others to learn its own pantomime.

pokemons.name: Happiny
pokemons.description: A Normal-type Pokémon that is often seen carrying an egg to bring happiness to others.

pokemons.name: Chatot
pokemons.description: A Normal/Flying-type Pokémon that mimics human speech and sound patterns.

pokemons.name: Spiritomb
pokemons.description: A Ghost/Dark-type Pokémon that is formed by 108 spirits trapped in an Odd Keystone.

pokemons.name: Gible
pokemons.description: A Dragon/Ground-type Pokémon that loves to bite and dig.

pokemons.name: Gabite
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Gible, a Dragon/Ground-type Pokémon with strong jaws and a love for digging.

pokemons.name: Garchomp
pokemons.description: The final evolution of Gible, a Dragon/Ground-type Pokémon with powerful jaws and wings for flight.

pokemons.name: Munchlax
pokemons.description: A Normal-type Pokémon that is the pre-evolution of Snorlax, known for its insatiable appetite.

pokemons.name: Riolu
pokemons.description: A Fighting-type Pokémon that is the pre-evolution of Lucario, known for its strong sense of justice.

pokemons.name: Lucario
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Riolu, a Fighting/Steel-type Pokémon with a strong sense of justice and aura powers.

pokemons.name: Hippopotas
pokemons.description: A Ground-type Pokémon that often digs through sand and lives in arid regions.

pokemons.name: Hippowdon
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Hippopotas, a large Ground-type Pokémon that creates sandstorms in the desert.

pokemons.name: Skorupi
pokemons.description: A Poison/Bug-type Pokémon that is known for its scorpion-like appearance.

pokemons.name: Drapion
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Skorupi, a Poison/Dark-type Pokémon with a powerful and toxic tail.

pokemons.name: Croagunk
pokemons.description: A Poison/Fighting-type Pokémon that secretes a toxic fluid from its skin.

pokemons.name: Toxicroak
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Croagunk, a Poison/Fighting-type Pokémon with powerful poison punches.

pokemons.name: Carnivine
pokemons.description: A Grass-type Pokémon known for its large mouth and the ability to trap prey using vines.

pokemons.name: Finneon
pokemons.description: A Water-type Pokémon that is often found in large groups, swimming gracefully in the water.

pokemons.name: Lumineon
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Finneon, a Water-type Pokémon that uses the patterns on its fins to communicate.

pokemons.name: Mantyke
pokemons.description: A Water/Flying-type Pokémon that is known for its friendly and gentle nature.

pokemons.name: Snover
pokemons.description: A Grass/Ice-type Pokémon that resembles a small tree covered in snow.

pokemons.name: Abomasnow
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Snover, a Grass/Ice-type Pokémon with a frosty and imposing appearance.

pokemons.name: Weavile
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Sneasel, a Dark/Ice-type Pokémon known for its speed and agility.

pokemons.name: Magnezone
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Magneton, an Electric/Steel-type Pokémon with powerful magnetic fields.

pokemons.name: Lickilicky
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Lickitung, a Normal-type Pokémon with an extremely long tongue.

pokemons.name: Rhyperior
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Rhydon, a Ground/Rock-type Pokémon with a powerful drill horn.

pokemons.name: Tangrowth
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Tangela, a Grass-type Pokémon with long, vine-like arms.

pokemons.name: Electivire
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Electabuzz, an Electric-type Pokémon with powerful electrical punches.

pokemons.name: Magmortar
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Magmar, a Fire-type Pokémon with powerful flames and cannons on its arms.

pokemons.name: Togekiss
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Togetic, a Fairy/Flying-type Pokémon that spreads happiness and joy.

pokemons.name: Yanmega
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Yanma, a Bug/Flying-type Pokémon with powerful wings and speed.

pokemons.name: Leafeon
pokemons.description: One of the evolved forms of Eevee, a Grass-type Pokémon that evolves through exposure to a Leaf Stone.

pokemons.name: Glaceon
pokemons.description: One of the evolved forms of Eevee, an Ice-type Pokémon that evolves through exposure to an Ice Stone.

pokemons.name: Gliscor
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Gligar, a Ground/Flying-type Pokémon known for its acrobatic flying skills.

pokemons.name: Mamoswine
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Piloswine, an Ice/Ground-type Pokémon with powerful tusks and a thick coat of fur.

pokemons.name: Porygon-Z
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Porygon2, a Normal-type Pokémon that has been upgraded with additional software.

pokemons.name: Gallade
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Kirlia, a Psychic/Fighting-type Pokémon that wields a blade-like arm.

pokemons.name: Probopass
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Nosepass, a Rock/Steel-type Pokémon with a magnetic nose that always points north.

pokemons.name: Dusknoir
pokemons.description: The evolved form of Dusclops, a Ghost-type Pokémon that guides spirits to the afterlife.

pokemons.name: Froslass
pokemons.description: An Ice/Ghost-type Pokémon that freezes its prey and then takes it to its lair.

pokemons.name: Rotom
pokemons.description: An Electric/Ghost-type Pokémon that can possess various appliances and change its form.

pokemons.name: Uxie
pokemons.description: A Psychic-type Pokémon that is said to have the ability to erase memories.

pokemons.name: Mesprit
pokemons.description: A Psychic-type Pokémon that is said to have the ability to control emotions.

pokemons.name: Azelf
pokemons.description: A Psychic-type Pokémon that is said to have the ability to bring about willpower.

pokemons.name: Dialga
pokemons.description: A Steel/Dragon-type Pokémon that is said to control time and govern the flow of time in the Pokémon world.

pokemons.name: Palkia
pokemons.description: A Water/Dragon-type Pokémon that is said to control space and govern the spatial dimensions in the Pokémon world.

pokemons.name: Heatran
pokemons.description: A Fire/Steel-type Pokémon that resides in volcanic caves and has a body made of molten lava.

pokemons.name: Regigigas
pokemons.description: A Legendary Pokémon that is said to have towed continents with ropes.

pokemons.name: Giratina
pokemons.description: A Ghost/Dragon-type Pokémon that is said to reside in a dimension known as the Distortion World.

pokemons.name: Cresselia
pokemons.description: A Psychic-type Pokémon that is said to represent the crescent moon.

pokemons.name: Phione
pokemons.description: A Water-type Pokémon that is said to be born in the warm seas of the Southern regions.

pokemons.name: Manaphy
pokemons.description: A Water-type Pokémon that is said to be born in the cold sea of the Northern regions.

pokemons.name: Darkrai
pokemons.description: A Dark-type Pokémon that is said to have the ability to give nightmares.

pokemons.name: Shaymin
pokemons.description: A Mythical Pokémon that can transform into its Sky Forme.

pokemons.name: Arceus
pokemons.description: The Alpha Pokémon that is said to have shaped the universe with its 1,000 arms.
